H0.text: What substance was believed by Alchemists to transmute other metals into gold. Mercury

H1.text: What substance was believed by Alchemists to transmute other metals into gold. Sulfur

H2.text: What substance was believed by Alchemists to transmute other metals into gold. Quartz

H3.text: What substance was believed by Alchemists to transmute other metals into gold. Carmot

A4.text: Mercury was called for in attempts at the transmutation of base (or impure) metals into gold, which was the goal of many alchemists.

A5.text: They believed that different metals could be produced by varying the quality and quantity of sulfur contained within the mercury.
